TopicTitle: We are Kerbals. Talk in Kerbanese.

Articles.Content:
Useless time!

You have two options:

x Write in reverse Spanish.

x Record your voice in Spanish, pitch it up and reverse it, then upload it (Leave link!).

(The latter is preferred)

I will start by writing (My computer, for some reason, does not have a mic input).

Luza se nibrek!

(Based on this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18229-We-are-probes-Talk-in-SSTV)

...ojaba aca odirruba se ,oicapse le ne yotse oN

Esto es facil

While reviewing this thread, our engineers felt that it would be irresponsible not to evaluate whether or not the thread was or was not really as awesome as they had claimed. Naturally that led to more questions than answers, due in no small part to the sudden unplanned demolition of an architectural research facility, and now we need your help.

I propose also having people in the thread talk in KSP Contract-style doublespeak.

Rewards:

1 Science

425 Funds

+12 Reputation
